tha-ap395:13.2: puthupāsaṇḍanissitā → mūḷhā saccavinissiṭā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | phutā saccavinissitā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | phuṭṭhasaccavinissaṭā (mr)
tha-ap395:15.3: susamo santo → susīlo asamo santo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | paññavā yuttacāgo ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap395:17.1: Saṅgātigo → saṅgātīto (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṅghātīto (pts-vp-pli1ed), hatamado → gatamado (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | tamanudo (mr)
tha-ap395:21.2: saddhammañcāpi vaṇṇayi → dhammañcāpi pakittayi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap395:27.4: Phuseyyuṃ → aññātañca vijāneyyaṃ passeyyaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | aññātañca vijāneyyaṃ phasseyyam (pts-vp-pli1ed) | passeyya (mr)
